allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add automatic context management and real-time token counting

Add real-time context window monitoring with configurable thresholds and
automatic compression triggers.

Features:
- ContextMonitor service with warning \(70%\), critical \(85%\), and
  auto-compress \(90%\) thresholds
- Real-time history token tracking in GeminiChat via
  getHistoryTokenCount\(\) and updateHistoryTokenCount\(\)
- Context warnings displayed in UI before each turn
- Footer shows color-coded context percentage \(blue <70%, yellow 70-90%, red >90%\)
- Automatic chat compression at 90% token threshold
- Configurable context management settings via Config

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve case sensitivity issue for macOS builds

Rename GeminiChat.ts to geminiChat.ts to match import paths.
This fixes build failures on macOS with case-sensitive file systems.

Also add task management features and UI components.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
